thread.title: Yahoo Bans Employees from Paid Fantasy-Sports Sites
thread.title_full: Yahoo Bans Employees from Paid Fantasy-Sports Sites - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Yahoo Bans Employees from Paid Fantasy-Sports Sites
text:
Yahoo Inc. is banning employees from playing in paid fantasy-sports contests, following similar moves by the two biggest daily fantasy-sports sites in the U.S.
The move comes as the fantasy-site purveyors have faced scrutiny over how much internal data employees have access to, and whether that data can help them win as contestants on other... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
